name: Please Don't Step on My Hat
name_original: Please Don't Step on My Hat
description:
A game built in 72 hours.

Built with Libretro (https://www.libretro.com/) to run in browser, on PC, and other devices.

Retro Arch core for Game Shell provided for the adventurous.  Should be able to load it onto a Game Shell by dropping the file in `.config/retroarch/cores/`.
